005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
019
020import java.util.Collection;
021import java.util.HashSet;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Set;
024import java.util.stream.Collectors;
025import java.util.stream.IntStream;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029public final class ArrayRemove {
030  private static final String NAME = "remove";
031  @NonNull
032  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
033      .name(NAME)
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextIndependent()
037      .focusIndependent()
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("array")
040          .type(IArrayItem.class)
041          .one()
042          .build())
043      .argument(IArgument.builder()
044          .name("positions")
045          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
046          .zeroOrMore()
047          .build())
048      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
049      .returnOne()
050      .functionHandler(ArrayRemove::execute)
051      .build();
052
053  private ArrayRemove() {
054    // disable construction
055  }
056
057  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
058  @NonNull
059  private static <T extends IItem> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
060      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
061      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
062      IItem focus) {
063    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
064        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
065    ISequence<? extends IIntegerItem> positions = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1)));
066
067    return ISequence.of(removeItems(array, positions));
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
072   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-remove">array:remove</a>.
073   *
074   * @param <T>
075   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
076   * @param array
077   *          the target Metapath array
078   * @param positions
079   *          the integer position of the items to remove
080   * @return a new array containing the modification
081   * @throws ArrayException
082   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
083   */
084  @NonNull
085  public static <T extends IItem> IArrayItem<T> removeItems(
086      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
087      @NonNull Collection<? extends IIntegerItem> positions) {
088    return remove(
089        array,
090        ObjectUtils.notNull(positions.stream()
091            .map(position -> position.asInteger().intValueExact())
092            .collect(Collectors.toSet())));
093  }
094
095  /**
096   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
097   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-remove">array:remove</a>.
098   *
099   * @param <T>
100   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
101   * @param array
102   *          the target Metapath array
103   * @param positions
104   *          the integer position of the items to remove
105   * @return a new array containing the modification
106   * @throws ArrayException
107   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
108   */
109  @NonNull
110  public static <T extends IItem> IArrayItem<T> remove(
111      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
112      @NonNull Collection<Integer> positions) {
113    Set<Integer> positionSet = positions instanceof Set ? (Set<Integer>) positions : new HashSet<>(positions);
114
115    List<T> remaining = ObjectUtils.notNull(IntStream.range(1, array.size() + 1)
116        .filter(index -> !positionSet.contains(index))
117        .mapToObj(index -> array.get(index - 1))
118        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
119
120    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(remaining);
121  }
122}
